thread.section_title: Hotel Residence Henri 4 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Totally Blissful
thread.title_full: Totally Blissful - Review of Hotel Residence Henri 4, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Coral K
title: Totally Blissful
text:
This was my first trip to Paris and staying in this charming hotel was the icing on the cake.The staff were charming the hotel itself had a great feel about it.My partner and i drove down from Sweden and was lucky enough to be able to park right outside the hotel.The hotel was tucked away on a nice quiet street in a lovely cosy corner.We were able to walk around Paris as the hotel was close to all the things we wanted to see in that area.We are planing to go back again this year as we loved it there so much.If you seek peace and tranquillity in where you stay i highly recommend this beautiful hotel.
Room Tip: Ask for a balcony room See more room tips
